## Description {#details}

TODO: Might pack better if we changed this to a Struct of Arrays, since <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> is width 32, making this struct width 33.

We could also potentially avoid storing the whole <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> (sizeof=32), instead choosing to store just the contents portion (sizeof=8) and a Kind enum, since we already know it is some type of immediate value. Stores a single debug operand, which can either be a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> for directly storing immediate values, or a <a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/valueidnum">ValueIDNum</a> representing some value computed at some point in the program. IsConst is used as a discriminator.

Definition at line 359 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-h">InstrRefBasedImpl.h</a>.
